author: tersec
content: why does https://notes.ethereum.org/@launchpad/kiln#Geth still point to `merge-kiln-v2`? As far as I know, it's in Geth master since a couple of weeks with the `--kiln` flag, and `kiln-merge-v2` looks to have been abruptly abandoned almost a month ago.
